title: Nimcard
summary: A turn-based strategy game based on playing cards with a difficult, yet beatable, AI to play against.
long_summary: A turn-based strategy game based on playing cards where the goal is to end with the highest score. Features a difficult AI and accessible interface, and served as an opportunity to practice immutable functional javascript and Web Workers.
